titleInfo.title: CBC vs Bethel College: McKenzie, Tennessee, Thursday, February 2 - De La Salle Gym

mods.abstract: The program for the Christian Brothers College/Bethel basketball game of February 2, 1956, provided the Bucs schedule and statistics for 1954-1955, photos and brief descriptions of each Buccaneer, charts of players for both teams and their jersey numbers, a historical sketch of CBC, and a classic advertisement for Coca-Cola.
mods.accessCondition: While CBU may house an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under copyright law. For all requests, please contact the Archives at archives@cbu.edu.
